name: Truc Lam Tay Thien Zen Monastery and Zen tour for Marta
description: This is a special experience for you to learn and practice zen in Truc Lam Tay Thien zen monastery. In addition, you also have  time to wandering around this peaceful mountainous area for sightseeing by yourself, feeling the slow life and become more optimistic. That's the time for you to find your soul in peace and to make friends with the friendly people who are the same vision with you.
